## 해찾기

### uniroot와 polyroot

```{r ex01}

ff <- function(x) {x^3-3}

uniroot(ff, c(0,2))

polyroot(c(-3, 0, 0, 1))

```

### optimize

```{r ex02}


ff <- function(x){x^3-9*x^2-5*x+100}

optimize(ff, lower = -2, upper = 9)
optimize(ff, lower = -2, upper = 9, maximum = T)

```
